name: Richard P. Martin
content: Richard Martin's Homepage Richard P. Martin Associate Professor Department of Computer Science, Rutgers University I am NOT hiring any students as research assistants for the Spring 2024 semester. If you see such an email or message, it is a scam. If you want to apply for grader or recitation PTL position, you can apply at this link Research I spend my time among a few laboratories. You can review my full CV or read an explanation of my research. For more detail, please see my list of publications (on DBLP) and talks. Laboratories WINLAB We do wireless research. Collaborations 2023 Summer Interships Teaching Spring 2024: CS 505: Computer Structures Office CoRE 304 Hours: By Appointment Contact Me Richard P. Martin Department of Computer Science Rutgers University 110 Frelinghuysen Road Piscataway, NJ 08854-8019 rmartin@rutgers.edu T: 848.445.8304 F: 732.445.0537
